channel.title: AsylumPvP Beta
channel.description:
[center]Hi der. This is AsylumPvP. We're currently in beta and building up our features and fixing bugs as we go. So you're welcome to come test with us :3
[url=http://asylumpvp.weebly.com]~ Website ~[/url] [url=http://www.asylumpvp.comlu.com/forum/]~ Forum ~[/url] [url=http://asylumpvp.weebly.com/play-now.html]~ Play Now ~[/url]
Features:
> Target System < > Train or go instantly pking < > Monsters yield pk points < > Quite good shops for a pking server < > Many weapon special attacks (adding more as i go) < > Quick set spawn tab < > FunPvP w/ random loots at home < > Reorganised home (built in varrocks big bank) < > Sets go to bank upon login (you must set a pin code instantly) <
Some media: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/c3324008a603cbca58161aa1b5337757.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/769dc22f61c425c12e60efb5bce57aed.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/16e228ded71e313f9168f4440b3b8cf0.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/afda40a21cd33b4b9e457838f6d84238.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/9b68137c87f66755e7b62daf9e6acb46.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a1e125670dae4c0bb6ea2b7704cd0e08.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/23c976655ca8d5c22dd1b2ea4ae8d416.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8bc7120ba6cbde88ad66a5c2db5607a3.png[/img][/center]

item.title: AsylumPvP Beta
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

[center]Hi der. This is AsylumPvP. We’re currently in beta and building up our features and fixing bugs as we go. So you’re welcome to come test with us :3

~ Website ~
~ Forum ~
~ Play Now ~

Features:

Target System <
Train or go instantly pking <
Monsters yield pk points <
Quite good shops for a pking server <
Many weapon special attacks (adding more as i go) <
Quick set spawn tab <
FunPvP w/ random loots at home <
Reorganised home (built in varrocks big bank) <
Sets go to bank upon login (you must set a pin code instantly) <
